name: Islehopper
description:
A cozy little game about being a bird and flying between some islands! Just a little demo to see how complicated of graphics I could fit into 2 tweets. Use arrow keys to control the bird!

end

b=y

a+=q(r)b+=u(r)h=sget(a&_,b&_)s=sin(t()/8)*4+64-(h-z)*64/j

j=u(m)/16l(w+q(r-j)*16,e+u(r-j)*16,w,f,13)l(w+q(r+.5+j)*16,e+u(r+.5+j)*16)end
